[ C usually plural ] informal a lot of something, especially writing: She's written reams of poetry.

a very large amount of information, usually on paper: Accountants at the firm were asked to turn over reams of financial records as part of the investigation. reams of paperwork/paper reams of information/data/material
[ C ]
  WORKPLACE, MEASURES 500 sheets of printing or writing paper: Can you order a ream of printer paper?
